channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #es @ 1534670794147737600
item.description:

Luego de esta capacitación 👨‍🏫 hemos dado un paso importante en materia de #DatosAbiertos💪 https://t.co/U6RBghG8Ze

item.title: #en @ 1534630415088107521
item.description: Project Singular - an exceptionally exciting genomics initiative in single ventricle heart disease including #Fontan circulation. Goal: data + whole genome sequencing on thousands of individuals and their family members, with open data sharing. #projectsingular #ACHD2022 https://t.co/eiMMK64EcB

item.title: #en @ 1534583533632512002
item.description: Curious about Open Data? Looking for tips on using public datasets? Want to learn more about the history of data sharing in NYC? Be sure to check out this NYC Open Data 101 session as part of #opendataweek, featuring @bronxbp! https://t.co/JDAcLQAfnN

item.title: #de @ 1534576156837560321
item.description:
Hoffe, das @BMG_Bund hat bis Herbst eine Abteilung eingerichtet, welche auf Nachfrage Antwort geben kann, welche Gelder an welche Medienhäuser für Covid-PR fließen/geflossen sind.
#OpenData

item.title: #es @ 1534575825286316032
item.description: Una buena y una en proceso de cambios en la analytica de https://t.co/TYZurt76ra: 1- Cada vez se suman más jovenes a leer temas "serios" de economía y política, sin virales ni clickbaits 2- Los hombres son bastante más que las mujeres en nuestro público. #OpenData de @memodiario https://t.co/DfEosAGQfI

item.title: #fr @ 1534574064144105472

@oceanprotocol V4 is live. The 🔑 to unlocking an Open Data Economy🌍 🌊 $OCEAN Smart Contracts 🌊Compute-to-data 🌊Datatokens and Data NFTs 🌊Data NFTs and much more.
Last chance, Buy the dip before the big pump!💸
#OceanONDAV4 #Data #Web3 #Crypto https://t.co/YoARhFNzyu

item.title: #en @ 1534545666596274179
item.description:

Many thanks for the lead @smlatorreo, @vinniman, Andrew Foster, @ThorstenLangner, @hernanaburbano and @KamounLab et al.! https://t.co/3PTfzrDQXQ

item.title: #en @ 1534541724248182784
item.description: #OpenSourceData is the future of what we are developing with @OpenSpecy @ToMExApp @ThePlastiverse. We are going beyond just sharing #OpenData and toward fully transparent #OpenSource ecosystems of data sharing applications developed by the community that they support.

item.title: #en @ 1534538900290560000
item.description:

The perfect way to wrap up the final week of the course. Many thanks to Stefaan, Sampriti, and the entire Govlab's team 🙏 https://t.co/fXEYXIS9Y0

item.title: #es @ 1534538728861061120
item.description: Con el regreso de la publicación diaria de #DatosAbiertos, al 6 de Junio se ajustan las medias de Guadalajara y Zapopan a 460 (+51) y 326 (+50) casos activos en los últimos 7 días, respectivamente. El grupo etario más ... (1) @RubiBobadilla @sonia_ssi @EFToussaint @DrCarlosAlonso https://t.co/ifcM2Q8PhU

item.title: #en @ 1534512452745969666
item.description: You will never have more power to enforce open data practices than you do as a reviewer. I regularly tell authors that “data available upon request” is insufficient; others should too. It can be a lot of work to clean/post data & code; make the request when authors are motivated! https://t.co/78EBzHeimg

item.description: 📰 Visiting a Norwegian newsroom today. @lambrechts of @btno talking about data journalism. “When you have open data, it is mostly data that companies and govt’s want you to see. item.title: #es @ 1534369808355143681
item.description: Según los datos abiertos, hoy hay 439 casos activos confirmados, y más de 500 activos estimados; eso supera con mucho las 290 camas generales reportadas por la Red IRAG. Cada vez hay menos hospitales de Red IRAG que envían datos. @HLGatell , ese reporteo necesita mejorar. https://t.co/pooo7at5b3

item.title: #es @ 1534318627905843200
item.description:
¿Qué son los datos abiertos?
Son datos digitales suministrados por instituciones para ser usados reutilizados y distribuidos libremente.
✅Evitan la corrupción ✅Proporcionan eficiencia ✅Ayudan a la auditoría social ✅Agilizar y dan transparencia a los procesos administrativos https://t.co/sSF8BLyLz1

item.title: #fr @ 1534141539911454720
item.description: @YvesLyon6938 @mmtchi Le gars c’est un ingénieur en électronique a la retraite. Il a eu une top carrière, a bosse au Texas pdt 5 ans, a été prof a Sofia-Antipolis. Et il lui est impossible de regarder les données publiques qui montrent que plus on est vaccinés plus l’incidence est élevée.

item.title: #fr @ 1534134828962127874
item.description: C'est dommage qu'un directeur de recherche du CNRS aille dans les médias diffuser une hypothèse fausse sur un sujet aussi sensible, sans préciser qu'elle est basée sur une hausse exceptionnelle vieille de 5 ans, et sans vérifier si les données (publiques) sont périmées ou pas...

item.title: #en @ 1534090548369313793
item.description: Really happy to hear @LavitranoML #ELIXIR22 stating that #Software is on equal footing with #Data under #EOSC. However, a design around FAIR and Open data, probably won't work for software. I'd argue that we need dedicated efforts to support software - and these are still limited

item.title: #en @ 1534035502067683328
item.description:
@fuellabs_ @LensProtocol Why does this matter?
I feel like the most interesting aspect of blockchains is in composability.
Transparency/verifiability is useful (e.g. fair orderbooks, supply chain)
Speed is useful (intl. payment of USDC)
Open data is really cool (OpenSea, Lens)

item.title: #es @ 1534026064229552128
item.description: 🧵 #COVID19mx Pues los datos abiertos de hoy solo agregaron 1 día más de datos a lo que compartí desde el sábado, así que la interpretación es la misma: el número promedio de nuevos casos confirmados por día se ha triplicado en el último mes... https://t.co/ZlxiTVfHH5 https://t.co/6E3xYQoxFb

item.title: #en @ 1533976320052498432
item.description: If I see a resume with preprints, and the preprints have open data, and you have a GitHub page, I will hire you 10/10 over someone with an equivalent resume or even 'fancier' papers. I don't give a hot buttered fuck where you published. Show me HOW you published. https://t.co/B9W8KlIysG

item.title: #en @ 1533952268537667585
item.description:
We took essential services away from the most vulnerable in society in order to assuage the suddenly-hypochondriac upper-middle class in developed nations, undoing years of progress in the process.
I treated this as a generational failure, because it was. https://t.co/Wsgp9nHXuw

item.title: #en @ 1533892750025818112
item.description: Open data is key to advocating for change. Looking at traffic volume/speed data for a street I want to advocate for a road diet on, the data clearly shows there's a huge speeding problem (this street has a 40 MPH speed limit). While most drivers speed, look at how many are 70+😲 https://t.co/U7DhG1S3OK
